body: what kinda mentally stunted organization would willingly send one of their own into a shitstorm like that?? Bro shit like that gets a fuckin task force smh

technically i don't think any of this thing is illegal... like they had a consent form and everything... like, who cares about consent in an illegal camgirl ring.
